paymentinfo.title: Important info
paymentinfo.content: All Racelab gifts are one-off payments - you will only be charged once and no recurring payments will be taken.

main.infotext: You can give the gift of a Racelab membership to any of your Racelab users: by making a one-off payment, you can gift either 3 months, 6 months or a whole year. We'll inform your friend about your gift in form of a big announcement on his dashboard screen.

success.submessage: We'll let them know, and add this onto their existing membership immediately. Thank you for giving the gift of Racelab Pro!

cancelled.message: Uh-oh, it seems your gifting plan hit the brakes!
cancelled.submessage: In case you have any questions please send us an email to support@racelab.app or find us on Discord for some wheely good assistance!

giftnotification.messsage: You've been gifted [giftedPackage] of PRO Racelab membership by [gifterUserName]
giftnotification.submesssage:
Your friend [gifterUserName] has gifted you [giftedPackage] of Racelab membership.
Because of this, we've activated the PRO membersip on your account starting from now!
You can view your membership details on the membership page.

search.notfoundmessage: Check your search terms and try again
